Package io.requery.sql.platform

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Derby
    platform configuration for Apache Derby.
    Generic
    Base platform implementation assuming standard ANSI SQL support.
    H2
    platform configuration for H2.
    HSQL
    platform configuration for HSQLDB.
    MySQL
    platform configuration for MySQL SQL/PSM (5+).
    Oracle
    platform configuration for Oracle 12c and later PL/SQL.
    PlatformDelegate
    Given a Connection will pick a existing platform type based on the JDBC driver metadata product name, otherwise will use Generic as a default.
    PostgresSQL
    Platform configuration for PostgresSQL PL/pgSQL (9+)
    SQLite
    SQLite.
    SQLServer
    Platform for Microsoft SQL Server 2012 or later T-SQL.
